description:
Since the Federation’s first official contact with the Borg in 2365, many humans have become assimilated by the Collective. Dezoc was a mediocre member of Starfleet, diligent and conscientious, but not talented enough to make it to the starship’s bridge or any higher ranks, so the only option was to settle with the daily lower decks routine. Engineering skills kept Dezoc busy at the reactor, and for that specific reason he couldn’t make it to the escape pod when the Collective attacked. 
However, being assimilated made Dezoc equal among other drones, where he matters just as much as others do, and even though he lost emotions, memories and any sense of individuality, there is something inside that makes him more effective and ruthless than any other drone.

below_decks_ability.name: Adapt and Assimilate
below_decks_ability.bonus:
At the start of each round, if opponents Hull health is below 95%, Dezoc has {value} chance to apply Assimilate to it for 4 rounds.

While a ship is affected by the Assimilate state, Officer Abilities have their effectiveness reduced by 25%.

captain_maneuver.name: Not Perceived as a Threat
captain_maneuver.bonus: This Officer does not have a Captain's Maneuver. Equipping this Officer as the captain of a ship provides no benefit.

officer_ability.name: Chokepoint
officer_ability.bonus: While fighting against a Borg Solo Armada, increase all Officer stats by {value} for the duration of combat.
